name: VR Laser Harp
description: Simulation of the Laser Harp used from the 80's, with original samples taken from an Elka Synthex for the authentic experience. Change octaves and scales to provide a full keyboard, this is a close simulation including the limitations of that original system.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 Processor: Intel Core i7 4790K Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
